form.title: Global Raid Setup
form.subtitle: Required player information
form.disclaimerText: Having issues linking? Email admin@pokebattler.com both of your Pokebattler user ids
form.discordConnect: Pokebattler Raid Party Network includes raids that are coordinated using Discord. To join a Discord raid connect your Pokebattler account with a new or existing Discord account.
form.correctness: Correct Trainer Name and Friend Code are required for smooth Raid Party coordination
form.friendCodeHint: Paste your friend code here. It should be 12 digits, no spaces

errors.updateSettingGeneral: There was an error updating your settings
errors.friendCodeLength: Friend code must be exactly 12 numbers long
